name: Hokuto No John
description:
John is a casual man : he have a job, a nice flat and he is in good shape. It's a simple life, but he want it better. He want to life it AT HIGH LEVEL ! 
Be prepared for the most awesome week (and some rest in the week end) and never lost any honor ! 

Made for the ENJAM in two (2) days 

By : 

Graph : Malézieux "Isaak" Hugo 
 ??? : Deltaplaneur
Prog : Séverin "Bata" Michaut
Prog : Horace "As_A_Dino" Ribout
Muzik : Abdoul-Jabar 'Yamakyu' Mayaki
